alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Duval County through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ortega, or near Jacksonville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Nas Jax, Ortega, San Marco, Riverside and Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Duval
